pullrequest.title: Fixes to Atlas limits and inertias

content.raw:
This looks like the right change to me. The command `grep 260 ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg` returns 3 pairs of f_min/f_max parameters, while `grep 110 ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg` returns only one pair. I'm guessing some code got copied, but not all the parameters replaced.

instances of 110 at [drc_skeleton_v2.cfg:504-505](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/05ca54cf52b5a09fc87ac57fbd7e1ac6e6520bb4/ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg#cl-504)

instances of 260 at [drc_skeleton_v2.cfg:526-527](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/05ca54cf52b5a09fc87ac57fbd7e1ac6e6520bb4/ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg#cl-526), [drc_skeleton_v2.cfg:643-644](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/05ca54cf52b5a09fc87ac57fbd7e1ac6e6520bb4/ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg#cl-643), [drc_skeleton_v2.cfg:665-666](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/05ca54cf52b5a09fc87ac57fbd7e1ac6e6520bb4/ros/atlas_utils/raw/drc_skeleton_v2.cfg#cl-665)
